title: 'Really Impressive'
body: Charcoal color, size 40. Really like the textured look of the fabric. This blazer is undoubtedly fantastic. Stitching quality is great. I tried it first with black, light fade Jeans for a casual look. Doesn't work. This fits better with a formal dress.
